name: the maple ridge commissioned artist button set by andrew zangerle.
description: for this series, from philadelphia-based artist andrew zangerle sourced images from his native western new york state to present his own take on the country home. both the name of his company and the country road he grew up on, the maple ridge explorers personal and philosophical ideas of home. plus, these houses are pretty in their soft, muted reality. this set is #1 in our three-part series of architecturally-inspired pinback sets. listing is for one set. each set includes all five button pictured. - all sets are packaged with recycled/recyclable backing cards lovingly letterpressed by the trip print press of toronto. - each card is also stamped, dated and numbered. and loved. sweetiepiepress.com

name: high street commissioned artist button set by suzy ultman.
description: fresh from the heart of ohio comes the sweetie pie press' newest buttons set designed by illustrator extraordinaire, . this set is #2 in our three-part series of architecturally-inspired pinback sets. from suzy herself: welcome to high street! a charming collection of smiling shoppes: worthington barber, ms. sweets and the old town pub. the threesome hails from a midwest town with new england flair (thanks to 11 connecticut families who settled the village in 1803). so, grab a pack of buttons and pin on some fashionable history. listing is for one set. each set includes all three button pictured. - all sets are packaged with recycled/recyclable backing cards lovingly letterpressed by the trip print press of toronto. - each card is also stamped, dated and numbered. and loved. sweetiepiepress.com

name: charms commissioned artist button set by sandi falconer.
description: just in time for the spookiest of days comes a superstitious new set from sandi falconer. charms! a rabbit's foot, a wishbone, a mystical gem, a pair of arrows and an all-seeing, ever-watching eye. protect yourself from wrongdoers and look good doing it! listing is for one set. each set includes all five button pictured. - all sets are packaged with recycled/recyclable backing cards lovingly letterpressed by the trip print press of toronto. - each card is also stamped, dated and numbered. and loved. sweetiepiepress.com

name: florals commissioned artist button set by alec thibodeau.
description:
dreaming of spring? want to give your sweetheart flowers that won't wilt? looking for a little something for the florist or gardener in your life?

the brand new design from providence, rhode island, artist, alec thibodeau might be just what you are looking for.

listing is for a set of three buttons (pictured) - a tulip, a rose and an iris.

each set is carded, dated and numbered in a limited run of 200.

http://www.sweetiepiepress.com
http://www.inkape.com

name: other cats commissioned artist button set by sarah mcneil.
description: as a companion set to the cats button set, sarah mcneil has supplied us with another trio of soft-hued felines for your adornment or home enhancement. - you will get a set of all three cat pinback button pictured above. - all sets are packaged with recycled/recyclable backing cards lovingly letterpressed by the trip print press of toronto. - each card is also stamped, dated and numbered. and loved. - the cats pin sets are made in a limited run of 200. photos graciously provided by anabela carniero http://www.sweetiepiepress.com http://www.400pencils.com

name: cats commissioned artist button set by sarah mcneil.
description: australian artist and illustrator, sarah mcneil, brings her very specific view of the world to this little trio of charming cats. - you will get a set of all three cat pinback button pictured above. - all sets are pacakged with recycled/recyclable backing cards lovingly letterpressed by the trip print press of toronto. - each card is also stamped, dated and numbered. and loved. - the cats pin sets are made in a limited run of 200. photos graciously provided by anabela carniero http://www.sweetiepiepress.com http://www.400pencils.com

name: deep forest commissioned artist button set by matty cipov.
description:
the sweetie pie press is very excited to be releasing two new button sets for the fall of 2009 by world-renowned milwaukee-based artist, matt "matty" cipov.

gleaned from his 2009 'creatures of the deep' illustration series, we submit to you a trio of terrors from the bowels of the forest - a deadly tiger, a foreboding owl and...another thing.

warning: this set may disturb your slumbers and/or make you produce works of literature akin to those of the brother grimm.

- you will get a set of all three sylvan pinback button pictured above.
- all sets are pacakged with recycled/recyclable backing cards lovingly letterpressed by the trip print press of toronto.
- each card is also stamped, dated and numbered. and loved.
- the deep forest pin sets are made in a limited run of 200.

http://www.sweetiepiepress.com
http://www.mattcipov.com

name: deep sea commissioned artist button set by matty cipov.
description:
the sweetie pie press is very excited to be releasing two new button sets for the fall of 2009 by world-renowned milwaukee-based artist, matt "matty" cipov.

gleaned from his 2009 'creatures of the deep' illustration series, we submit to you a trio of terrors from the plummy depths of the ocean - a thrashing shark, a grabby gastropod and a ghastly eel.

warning: this set may cause sea sickness and/or aquaphobia.

- you will get a set of all three marine pinback button pictured above.
- all sets are pacakged with recycled/recyclable backing cards lovingly letterpressed by the trip print press of toronto.
- each card is also stamped, dated and numbered. and loved.
- the deep sea pin sets are made in a limited run of 200.

http://www.sweetiepiepress.com
http://www.mattcipov.com

name: fireworks commissioned artist button set by ray fenwick.
description:
illustrator and textophile extraordinaire, ray fenwick, has designed this brand new set for us to celebrate the lunacy of entertainment-based explosives.

yup, all the words on these buttons add up to the names of fireworks. gleaned from his time working for a fireworks outfit in winnipeg, these names do much to illuminate the joyous ridiculousness of pyrotechnics in general.

kablammo!

each set come with all buttons pictured and is carded, dated and numbered.
limited run of 200.

name: let's bake commissioned artist button set by anda corrie.
description:
fresh off our button press, you can pretty much smell the sweet aroma of this new commissioned artist button set by anda corrie.

let's bake! contains all six buttons pictured and is designed to inspire the simple joys of baking through anthropomorphic ingredients.

yum!

each set comes carded, dated and numbered.
these buttons are released in a limited run of 200.

name: duck duck goose commissioned artist button set by alec thibodeau
description:
move over john audobon, there's a new ornithological illustrator in town.

this meticulous set of naturalist illustrations come to the sweetie pie press via rhode island artist, alec thibodeau. mr. thibodeau is also the creator of all kinds of illustrated fauna which he hand pulls and disseminates under the name 'ink ape'. he's even made his own currency. how many people can say that?

this listing is for one carded and numbered set of six buttons.

www.inkape.com
www.sweetiepiepress.com

name: toofs commissioned artist button set by becky johnson.
description:
we are pleased to introduce our newest artist set:

toofs
by becky johnson

a glistening trio of teeth in celebration of dental diversity
1. normal shiny toof
2. sparkling gold toof
3. historically wooden toof

what's more? to gold one really shines and shimmers! what a coup of technical prowess!

listing is for one set. each set includes all three button pictured.

- all sets are packaged with recycled/recyclable backing cards lovingly letterpressed by the trip print press of toronto.
- each card is also stamped, dated and numbered. and loved.

http://www.sweetiepiepress.com

name: pin pals commissioned artist button set by sara guindon.
description: i got a couple of these sets back from a remote consignment shop. check 'em! pin pals by sara guindon sara is a montreal-based illustrator and artists whose specifically styled 'pin pals' characters have found their way from paper dolls to t-shirts and now into 1" button form. pin these guys onto a cardigan or bag and watch them play out their complicated dramas across your accessories. listing is for one set. each set includes all five button pictured. - all sets are packaged with recycled/recyclable backing cards lovingly letterpressed by the trip print press of toronto. - each card is also stamped, dated and numbered. and loved. http://www.sweetiepiepress.com http://saraguindon.com

name: diy security envelope installation kit - 21 piece triangle.
description:
tired of feeling like installations are only for bank lobbies and boutique hotels? want some thing small for your walls that lives in three dimensions and exalts the mundane? want it to be relative easy?

...then the sweetie pie press do-it-yourself security envelope installation kit is for you!

this first kit, the 21 triangle, includes:
21 different security envelope buttons
21 nails
21 super powerful yet tiny magnets
one instructional sheet with a layout grid upon it
links to a helpful host of tips (online)

you will need to supply:
a hammer
a level
a wall

the finished piece will measure 8.5" square. the clever among you will realize that it can point any direction you like.

the installation pictured took me 27 minutes including constant photography.

all buttons are made from actual security envelopes. your selection will contain no doubles. special requests may be possible (stripes, blues...) but it is best to message me in advance. the buttons still retain their pinback and can be worn, if desired. 

*first image courtesy handmodel.ca*

name: chiogami buttons
description:
chiogami paper is a japanese paper with ornate patterning created through a multi-layer screenprinting process.

the myriad designs offer stunning results in pinback buttons.

the sweetie pie press works with a local importer to select a wide range of patterns and colour options to suit just about every taste.

the chiogami buttons serve as excellent accessories for fashion applications. plus, they are endlessly fascinating to behold in their tiny intricacies.

you may select any combination of patterns and colours, or just leave the choosing up to us. we'll always take care of ya!

name: impeach harper 50 button pack.
description:
feel like expressing your distaste for canada's most endless prime minister. me, too.

based on a commission from a friend, these buttons are now being offered up far and wide and sold at deep discount in large batches, with the goal of spreading the word!

stock up and pass 'em around.

i have listed these in batches of 50, but you are welcome to order multiple batches - the shipping charge will not increase with greater quantities.

available for a (hopefully) limited time. although that is what i thought in 2008.
